Randomized Exact Median

Posted on January 13, 2019

Median finding problem is easy to describe. In a given set of numbers of size say $n$, it is simply finding a $(n/2)^{th}$ largest element. Efficient (linear time) deterministic algorithm for solving this problem have been there for a while. Asymptotically we have achieved the best we could, but when... [Read More]
